heading: netanyahu defeated
subheading: israeli prime minister benjamin netanyahu conceded defeat to labor party leader ehud barak shortly after the voting ended monday. separate exit polls gave barak nearly 60 percent of the votes to roughly 40 percent for the incumbent. netanyahu also said he intends to step down as leader of the right-wing likud party.
author: wired staff
text: israeli prime minister benjamin netanyahu conceded defeat to labor party leader ehud barak shortly after the voting ended monday. separate exit polls gave barak nearly 60 percent of the votes to roughly 40 percent for the incumbent. netanyahu also said he intends to step down as leader of the right-wing likud party.
